text: Park Gyu-ri (born on May 21, 1988 in Seoul) is a South Korean singer. She is often known by the mononym Gyuri. She was a member of the girl group Kara, which was formed by DSP Entertainment in 2007. As the leader of the group, she is reported to have come up with its name. == References == == Other websites == * * Park Gyu-ri at Dain Entertainment * Category:1988 births Category:Actors from Seoul Category:K-pop singers Category:Kara (South Korean group) members Category:Living people Category:Singers from Seoul Category:South Korean movie actors Category:South Korean radio personalities Category:South Korean television actors Category:South Korean voice actors
title: Park Gyu-ri
